answers.answer: Hello,Normal body temprerature ranges from 97.5 to 98.8 F (36.4 to 37.1 C).Low body temperature is when it is lower than 95 F.Mild reductions in body temperature are due to temperature fluctuations during the day but if persistent then it can be due to some pathology.Causes may include hypothyroidism,Raynaud’s disease, diabetes ,adrenal gland insufficiency (Addison's disease),hypothalamus dysfunction,liver or kidney failure, alcoholism and medicines like phenothiazines, barbiturates, opiates, clonidine, lithium and benzodiazepines.For a confirmatory diagnosis,thorough investigations are needed to rule out these conditions.An evaluation by a physician will be the best.Hope it helps.Take care and pls do keep me posted on how you are doing
